synthesis_conditions.description: The crystals of [Pb(adda)(DMF)]n were ground to microcrystals with a size less than 50 µm. 1 g crystallite of samples were added to polyacrylate (5 mL), and then the mixture was adequately blended by ultrasonication and bubbles were removed in the evacuated chamber. The flexible Pb-MOF film with a thickness of 200 µm was gained by knife coating the mixture on the polyethylene terephthalate (PET) substrate.
